    • Method Detail

      • getSingerById

        @Select(value="select * from tb_pms_singer where id = #{id}")
PMSSinger getSingerById(Long id)
        Get singer by singer's id in pms.
        Parameters:
        id - Singer's id in pms.
        Returns:
        Singer in pms.

      • getSingersByIds

        @SelectProvider(type=SingerSqlProvider.class,
                method="getSingersByIds")
List<PMSSinger> getSingersByIds(@Param(value="ids")
                                                                                                                        List<Long> ids)
        Get all singers by singers id in pms.
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of ids of these singers.
        Returns:
        A list of pms singers.

      • getSingerByNameAndType

        @Select(value="select * from tb_pms_singer where name = #{name} and type = #{type}")
PMSSinger getSingerByNameAndType(String name,
                                                                                                                      Integer type)
        Get singer by name and type in pms.
        Parameters:
        name - Singer's name.
        type - Which platform this singer belongs to, 1 for qqmusic, 2 for ncm, 3 for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Singer in pms.

      • getAllSingersBySongId

        @Select(value="select b.id, b.type, b.name, b.avatar from tb_song_singer a join tb_pms_singer b on a.fk_singer_id = b.id where a.fk_song_id = #{songId}")
List<PMSSinger> getAllSingersBySongId(Long songId)
        Get all singers by song's id in pms.
        Parameters:
        songId - Song's id in pms.
        Returns:
        A list of pms singers.

      • addSinger

        @InsertProvider(type=SingerSqlProvider.class,
                method="addSinger")
 @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true,
         keyProperty="id")
int addSinger(PMSSinger singer)
        Add singer in pms.
        Parameters:
        singer - Singer in pms.
        Returns:
        The id of new added singer in pms.

      • deleteSinger

        @Delete(value="delete from tb_pms_singer where id = #{id}")
int deleteSinger(Long id)
        Delete singer by singer's id in pms.
        Parameters:
        id - Singer's id in pms.
        Returns:
        1 for success, 0 for fail.

      • updateSinger

        @UpdateProvider(type=SingerSqlProvider.class,
                method="updateSinger")
int updateSinger(PMSSinger singer)
        Update singer information in pms.
        Parameters:
        singer - Updated singer in pms.
        Returns:
        1 for success, 0 for fail.
